items.name: Beak
items.desc: We teamed up with our friends at BOXCAR brewery to make this juicy DIPA. We used a combination of our house yeasts and hopped with all our favourite hops - Citra, Mosaic, Galaxy and Enigma. Everything comes together to make a beer with a restrained malt profile and dank flavours of mango and pineapple with a sappy aftertaste.

items.name: Oliver's
items.desc: Sparkling Medium Fine Perry Pale, wheat yellow colour with gentle sparkle. Aroma of pineapple, elderflower and mixed citrus. Taste of sweet fruitiness and tangy citrus with flavours of pineapple chunks, ripe melon and lychee. Tasty finish and mouthfeel Fermented with wild yeasts

items.name: Oopla
items.desc: Oopla is a unctuous 10% imperial stout brewed with six varieties of roasted, crystal and chocolate malts along with flaked oats, organic Madagascan vanilla pods and 30kg of freshly roasted coffee for heady, warming flavours of bourbon, black treacle and cacao nibs.

items.name: Self-Portrait
items.desc: A light, fluffy, pale ale brewed with London Fog yeast, extra pale malt, wheat and two of our favourite southern hemisphere hops, Vic Secret and Galaxy, for flavours of pineapple, passionfruit and bergamot.

items.name: Tumbles
items.desc:
We've gone beyond our normal hopping rates for this beer and increased the percentage of flaked oats and wheat to create an IPA with super fluffy mouthfeel and flavours of grapefruit, pine, peach and passionfruit.
Yeast: London Fog.
Hops: Simcoe, Amarillo and Centennial.
